main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 9 June 1956 in Sapulpa, Oklahoma. One ball-like object, silver in color and the size of a baseball held at arm's length, was observed maneuvering at 150 mph speed for approximately 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was observed maneuvering at a speed of 150 mph and was the size of a baseball held at arm's length.
There were several similar sightings in the area, suggesting a correlation of sighting in the area.
The report indicates that the object made sudden movements and was tracked east and north of the observed location.
The weather conditions at the time of sighting were clear with no clouds in the sky and over 20 miles of visibility.
The observers were located approximately three miles east of Sapulpa, Oklahoma, and included a male and a female, with the male's details redacted.
sighted object: one ball-like object, silver in color, the size of a baseball held at arm's length, maneuvering at a speed of 150 mph
